overview: Seven erotic vignettes. Tales include "Face to Face" about a man who has the amazing ability to change his appearance and play the ultimate mind game on women, "Limousine Service" about two women spending the night out on the town when they cross paths with a mysterious stranger and "Sweet, Wild, Don't" about an extraordinary casting session.
tagline: Sexually-charged tales from Hollywood's hottest young filmmakers.
title: Playboy: Sexy Shorts
